data.title: ParSNIP: Parametrization of SuperNova Intrinsic Properties
data.name: parsnip
data.description: Deep generative modeling of astronomical transient light curves

evidence: "ParSNIP learns a generative model of transients from a large dataset of transient light curves. This code has many applications including classification of transients, cosmological distance estimation, and identifying novel transients."
"Deep generative modeling of astronomical transient light curves"
"Instructions on how to install and use ParSNIP can be found on the ParSNIP readthedocs page" (no mention of package managers or binaries, implying use from the source repository).
